items.preText: Naim Noor Arnob: "Bangladesh just couldn't adjust to the pace and bounce that is on offer in New Zealand. However, I won't write off some magical performances from Bangladesh in the World Cup."
items.text: full and angling in, he is struck on the pad as he misses the flick but slipping way down

items.preText: AJ: "Minnows tag it keeps following Bangladesh Team. No matter how much they deny there performance says is all. "

items.text: the trap was set, it was well directed, short at the body and it ballooned up, as New Zealand may have wanted but wide of the leg gully
